Interface MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.TargetElementNavigator

Enclosing class:
MaryGenericFeatureProcessors
public static interface MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.TargetElementNavigator

Navigate from a target to an item. Classes implementing this interface will retrieve meaningful items given the target.

Author:
Marc Schröder

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Element getElement(Target target)
          Given the target, retrieve an XML Element.
 

Method Detail

getElement

org.w3c.dom.Element getElement(Target target)
Given the target, retrieve an XML Element.

Parameters:
target -
Returns:
an item selected according to this navigator, or null if there is no such item.
